name: The Vine Intervention
description:
In this game you play as a small vine guy name Vinny, who is rooted to the ground. His root prevents him moving too far. However, gathering fertiliser increases the length of the root. 

Traverse a 3D environment and collect as much fertiliser as you can. The more fertiliser you collect, the more of the level you can access. Across the level there are a few carrots that can also be collected. These trophies are much more rare and valuable than the fertilisers.

Vinny is equipped with a water gun, that allows him to grow "PlantForms" to access higher areas. Just point and fire the gun at soil patches scattered across the level.

[ CONTROLS ]

  • WASD - Move
  • SHIFT - Sprint
  • MOUSE - Aim Camera
  • M1 - Shoot
  • M2 - ADS
  • F - Shine Light
  • CTRL - Crouch / Dive
  • E - Melee Attack

Game Jam page - https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/vine-intervention-8

The level in the Game Jam build is incomplete and contains a few issues
